'''Forhend''' was a [[Man]] of [[Brethil]] and one of the guards at the Crossings of [[Taeglin]].
When [[Húrin]] first appeared, Forhend was afraid and suggested to thrust him out of Brethil immediately.<ref>{{WJ|Hurin}}, pp. 274-5</ref>
